enhancedContent.overview:
The Water Tracker Notion Template is a focused wellness tool designed to help you build and maintain healthy hydration habits. Created by Ferran Buireu, this free template transforms the simple act of drinking water into a trackable, measurable wellness practice with historical insights and customizable reminders.

Hydration is one of the most fundamental aspects of health, yet it's easy to forget to drink enough water throughout busy days. This template addresses that challenge by providing an easy logging system, comprehensive history tracking, and reminder functionality‚Äîall within your Notion workspace where you likely already spend significant time.

With 275 sales and positive user ratings, this template has helped hundreds of users develop better hydration habits. It's particularly valuable during wellness challenges, fitness programs, or simply as a daily health baseline. The template proves that sometimes the simplest health interventions‚Äîlike drinking more water‚Äîbenefit most from thoughtful tracking and gentle accountability.

complexityLevel.label: Beginner-Friendly
complexityLevel.details: Extremely simple template focused solely on water tracking. Just open the template and start logging your water intake. No complex setup or Notion expertise required.

faqs.question: How do I log my water intake?
faqs.answer: The template provides a simple logging system where you record each time you drink water throughout the day. You'll track your daily consumption to ensure you stay properly hydrated, with the interface designed to make logging quick and effortless.

faqs.question: How do the reminders work in Notion?
faqs.answer: The template includes a customizable reminder system that you can set up to prompt you to drink water at specific times throughout the day. These work through Notion's built-in reminder functionality, sending you notifications when it's time to hydrate.

faqs.question: Can I see my hydration history and trends?
faqs.answer: Yes! The template provides detailed history and data tracking, allowing you to view your water intake patterns over time. This helps you understand your progress and identify specific times or circumstances when you tend to underhydrate.

faqs.question: What if I drink different amounts at different times (bottle vs. glass)?
faqs.answer: The template is designed to track your total daily water consumption. You can customize how you log intake to accommodate different container sizes, ensuring accurate tracking regardless of whether you're drinking from bottles, glasses, or other containers.
